filter<br />filterFramework.description: Child filter component to use inside the Multi Filter.

filterParams.description: Custom parameters to be passed to the child filter component.

floatingFilterComponent<br />floatingFil.description: Floating filter component to use for the child filter.

floatingFilterComponentParams.description: Custom parameters to be passed to the floating filter component.

display.description: Configures how the filter is shown in the Multi Filter.

title.description: The title to be used when a filter is displayed inside a sub-menu or accordion.

setModel(model).description:
Sets the state of the filter using the supplied models. Providing `null` as the model will de-activate all child filters.

Note: if you are using any child filters with asynchronous behaviour (e.g. Set Filter with asynchronous values), you should use the `whenReady` method after calling `setModel` to ensure that the filter is ready before any further action is taken, e.g. `filter.setModel([null, { values: ['a', 'b'] }]); filter.whenReady(function() { gridApi.onFilterChanged(); });`

whenReady(callback).description: If you are using any child filters with asynchronous behaviour (e.g. Set Filter with asynchronous values), you should use this method to perform any actions after calling `setModel` to ensure that the filter is ready.

getChildFilterInstance(index).description: Returns the child filter instance at the specified index.
